title: Miss fortunes Q hits twice?
body:
How come when i see videos there are 2 hits when miss fortune Qs, http://plays.tv/video/575420b6939257b679/mf-angrysloth-oneshot?from=user



NOT MISS FORTUNES FUCKING BOUNCE. IM TALKING ABOUT THE SECOND HIT ON THE SAME TARGET. 

God damn idiots are real

replies.body: Is this a joke? Someone please tell me this is a joke.
I'm a tad confused, you're talking about the Q's ricochet? or is there something in the video I'm missing?
Yes, her Q bounces to the next target in a somewhat wide cone. If the first target was killed, the second gets critted.
That's how her Q works? Defended, don't do this to me ._.

> [{quoted}](name=OurLestrade,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LoTzQKpI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-06T16:25:36.347+0000)
>
> That's how her Q works? Defended, don't do this to me ._.

Im not talking about the bounce..... Im talking about the second hit on the same target what is that

> [{quoted}](name=Defended,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LoTzQKpI,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-06T18:54:17.024+0000)
>
> Im not talking about the bounce..... Im talking about the second hit on the same target what is that

IT doesn't look like anyone answered your question.
{{champion:21}}  passive is Love tap, it does bonus damage the first time you attack something and it shows up as a second tick of damage and it crits with the original damage.

Her Q applies love tap. So when it bounces to a new target you get the Q damage and the love tap damage at the same time, showed side by side.

> [{quoted}](name=Mistress Shyvana,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LoTzQKpI,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-08T07:58:56.175+0000)
>
> IT doesn't look like anyone answered your question.
> {{champion:21}}  passive is Love tap, it does bonus damage the first time you attack something and it shows up as a second tick of damage and it crits with the original damage.
> 
> Her Q applies love tap. So when it bounces to a new target you get the Q damage and the love tap damage at the same time, showed side by side.

I didnt know love tap applied to her q

> [{quoted}](name=Defended,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LoTzQKpI,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-08T16:55:39.614+0000)
>
> I didnt know love tap applied to her q

Yeah it does, and if the first hit kill the target both the damage and passive crits. 

And after level 11 I think her passive is on a 100% AD scaling so the damage gets pretty crazy.

Wtf niggiii ?! How much harm can Dynamic queue do...Ok...Gold I In the basis
* You hit a minion with fortunes Q ( it needs to be a last hit or a hit that you know  will kill the minion ...pretty much a last hit ) Now if the enemy player is nearby that minion that q will bounce and hit him . You got it .

> [{quoted}](name=Herny knock down,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LoTzQKpI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-06T16:42:56.428+0000)
>
> Wtf niggiii ?! How much harm can Dynamic queue do...Ok...Gold I In the basis
> * You hit a minion with fortunes Q ( it needs to be a last hit or a hit that you know  will kill the minion ...pretty much a last hit ) Now if the enemy player is nearby that minion that q will bounce and hit him . You got it .

No.
her passive is also applied on the second bounce, not sure if it can crit tho.
